result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrea B Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $20.00 per month to commence 12/01/2016 along with payment plan fee of $15.00. Alternate 6 days jail.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Daniel P. Murray.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Prosecuting attorney moves to amend Count 2 to Disorderly Conduct contrary to section 13.102(c)(8)  of the Waukesha County Code of Ordinances.  Court approves amendment.  No contest plea entered.  Court 1 is dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the following:

FINE:  $210.80

DOMESTIC VIOLENCE SURCHARGE:  $100.00

to be paid at the rate of $20/month commencing 12/1/16 or 6 days jail for penalty for non payment of fine.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 17, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Daniel P. Murray.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has completed the counseling that was needed, but does not have the certificate of completion. Defense counsel is requesting a short adjournment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 17, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Daniel P. Murray.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Murray indicates the defendant is engaged in counseling and intends to complete the program August 8, 2016.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrea B Johnson
Current: 9646 W Bradley Rd Apt 109, Milwaukee, WI 53224 United States  (Effective: 06-27-2016)
Prior: 2012 Macarthur Rd,#d, Waukesha, WI 53188
Review hearing on June 27, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Case called at 9:13 a.m.  Attorney Daniel P. Murray in court.   Defendant Andrea B Johnson did not appear.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Murray does not know why Defendant does not appear.  Defendant now appears at 9:15 a.m. Defendant has enrolled in counseling and will complete in August.  State requires Defendant to complete counseling.  Court adjourns.  Bail remains as fixed.  Review hearing scheduled for June 27, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 13, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Daniel P. Murray.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment for his client to complete a domestic abuse counseling course. State has no objections. Court grants.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 13, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Hearing at 02-10-2016 08:30 am

Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Daniel P. Murray.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment as he has not received Discovery. State has no objections. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Hearing at 01-05-2016 08:30 am

Defendant Andrea B Johnson in court with attorney Ronald Sonderhouse for  attorney Daniel P. Murray.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant is not to have no violent contact with victim/witnesses listed in the criminal complaint.   Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.  Arraignment scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
